dmca.title: Born-again-Christian doesn't want its biographies reborn (5)
dmca.body:
12th Sept 2005

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
USA

DMCA Multiple Copyright Violations by [private]

I, [private], am the sole owner of the website
born-again-christian.info, which has had original copyright material,
authored by me, taken from it without permission and posted illegally on
webpages listed in Google.com. In addition to multiple copyright
infringement, our legitimate copyright notices have been removed in
violation of International Copyright Law, and US Federal Law. Please
remove all the infringing pages from your index immediately, and kindly
reply to:

[private]@born-again-christian.info

Confirming your compliance with our request in accordance with DMCA
1998.

The copyrighted works at issue are the copyright texts that appear on
our website at:

http://www.born-again-christian.info/islam.htm
http://www.born-again-christian.info/merat.htm
http://www.born-again-christian.info/ex.muslim.convert.htm

Here follow details of the infringements:

The Infringer's website is: http://free.prohosting.com/7lord/

Infringer: [private] no contact address given

The infringing pages are here:

http://free.prohosting.com/7lord/islam.htm Islam forsaken

http://free.prohosting.com/7lord/muslim.htm Once were muslim

http://free.prohosting.com/7lord/merat.htm Muslim convert

http://free.prohosting.com/7lord/exmuslimconvert.htm Muslim to Christ

The option to download the complete website including this illegally
used material is given at this url:

http://free.prohosting.com/7lord/download.htm

Statutory Declaration:

I, [private], have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted
materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I declare*, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

*NOTE: I am a Christian missionary, God's Word specifically commands me
NOT to swear, just let your yes be yes. (Holy Bible, James 5:12; 'But
above all things, my brethren, swear not, neither by heaven, neither by
the earth, neither by any other oath: but let your yea be yea; and your
nay, nay; lest ye fall into condemnation.') Therefore I don't swear
anything, I simply declare the above to be true.

SIGNED: [private]
DATE: 12th Sept 2005
